content: and fan hem bind off loosely in the next row you will be increasing to get a stitch count that is a multiple of 12 stitches which is required for the feather and fan block garment and add a ribbon or i-cord through the eyelets if pattern desired for all sizes except 12m knit 17 19 39 21 - 47 25 17 27 19 m1 6 6 3 6 - 3 6 9 6 9 times k 0 0 0 0 - 0 0 6 0 0 size 12m knit a round you will now have 108 120 120 132 132 144 156 168 168 180 stitches ©button & bean designs 2010 p aige baby do ll | 6 cabled a-line skirt using 4 5mm needles and main yarn remove sorm k3 pm knit 28 32 33 36 38 41 44 47 48 51 pm k6 pm knit 26 30 31 34 36 39 42 45 46 49 place sorm the start of the round will now be 5 stitches before where it was originally hem knit 2 stitches pm knit to end of round change to cc the following section forms the cable a-line pattern round 1 knit round 1 *knit to marker yo sm knit to marker sm yo repeat from * once and knit to end of round round 2 purl round 2 *knit to marker sm c4f k2 sm repeat from * repeat rounds 1 & 2 2 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 3 3 more times for a once and knit to end of round total of 6 6 6 6 8 8 8 8 8 8 rounds round 3 * knit to 2 stitches before marker ssk yo sm loosely cast off knit to marker sm yo k2tog repeat from * once and knit to block garment and add a ribbon or i-cord through the eyelets if end of round desired round 4 *knit to marker sm k2 c4b sm repeat from * i want to say a very very special thank you to my wonderful testers without who once and knit to end of round this pattern would just be one of those fleeting ideas in my head thank you so repeat rounds 1 4 until garment measures 28 30 32 34 much kathryn kath margaret natalya nat ali deanne becca kylie odette helen tasha jacquie julia sheryl lauren krissie rachael elaine christine and 35 36 38 40 42 44 cm from top of shoulder shannon also a big thank you to georgie my tech editor ☺ ©button & bean designs 2010 p aige baby do ll | 7 getting rid of the underarm holes after casting on 1 knit 3 rounds after 4 this will pull the hole casting on under the arms tight firming up the stitch making the underarm look much neater 2 directly above the hole pick up the back loop of the stitch that is loose that 5 this is what it looks like from creates
